item.title: Radio War Gear
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Let me clearly start this with: I never endorse an aggressive response to an encounter with conscious beings - particularly those from a different place or time. One does not simply traverse the cosmic space-ways or tackle the metaphysics of phasing between timelines to arrive and start blasting radiation at the new individuals they find inhabiting this foreign time-scape. A green color for those looking for lower frequency.

item.title: About
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: About me? I’ve got a computer that talks to me. My bed is in love with me. And it would seem the rest of the world has written me off as crazy, over the hill, or such a threat they wouldn’t dare confront me for fear of acknowledging it. Series Cool Talk You know what would be cool? Here we are, Cool Talk, with Jerad. Pigeons holed him as a one-off.

item.title: A Gift To The Gifted
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: A gift to the gifted Seen our entire lives. More than family, more than a sibling, more than self in many ways. He was all of us and still is. Up until our immergence in New Zealand 2018 we were all one.

item.title: Oh Look What We've Done
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Oh Look We've Done Less than three years ago I was in a bad place and had not realized it yet. I had no job and was in the first year of a two year campaign targeted at arresting my life with my family, friends, wife and career. He cannot afford you: I could not afford my wife. My cost of living could no longer be bottom lined with cup of noodles, bus passes, and offloading as much extra cost and time to my parents, such as laundry and dinner, as possible.

item.title: Why Can't We All Just Get Along
item.author: jsacosta1103@gmail.com (Jerad Acosta)
item.description: Why Can't We All Just Get Along Practices for us to better life together. As once one, now many, we are always from each other. Some may say our best selves are in each other. What makes you, you, brings ability and capacity to us all. What makes us, us, provides acceptance and understanding to you. Self - Selves Individual - Individuality Universal - Universality Place your entire life in a container
